text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: Device used for administering extra oxygen to the patient.

purpose.value: This DeviceUseStatement resource represents the adaptations for the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) Respiration v3.2 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/Respiration-v3.2(2020EN)) of [zib MedicalDevice v3.3.1 (2020)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/MedicalDevice-v3.3.1(2020EN)).
